name: Flappy Bitter Jam
description:
Click mouse or press a key to fly higher. Collect the hearts to go faster. See how many hearts you can collect before you die.

Made in 3 hours for Bitter Jam #1

sounds from: https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

gfx (as required by teh jam) from https://reddashgames.itch.io/bitterjam-01-tileset
